Description.Text: The CITEA APART - HOTEL is a hotel. Located in Achrafieh area..

The Citea Apart – Hotel is a four-star property located in the heart of Ashrafieh, 20 minutes away from the airport and in close proximity to the capital’s most famous landmarks, including ABC Mall, Sassine Square, Downtown and the Badaro-Sodeco district. The 78 spacious accommodations feature air conditioning, fully equipped kitchen, sitting area, television, working desk and a private bathroom. Buffet breakfast is served daily and the restaurant located at the rooftop serves Mediterranean cuisine whilst the lounge bar offers informal lunches, afternoon high tea and early drinks. Room service is available on limited hours. Additional services also include a 24-hour reception, laundry and dry cleaning services, valet parking, baggage storage, airport transfer service and private parking.
